Name: Chicago Fire
Title: Damage Control
Desc: Kidd, Seager and Carver investigate a city stables fire; Herrmann struggles to keep it together.
LongDescription: Kidd, Seager and Carver investigate a fire at the city stables; Kylie clashes with some of the firefighters over changes due to budget cuts; Herrmann struggles to keep it together as Cindy's condition worsens.
